backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing user profiles, question management (with subjects and class levels), full syllabus mock tests with sections, test attempts tracking, leaderboard functionality, and admin registration with access control and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four features related to investigating and fixing connection timeout errors (22+ seconds) on the Admin Registration page, including timeout reduction, health checks, and authentication delegation fixes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of frontend files including App.tsx, route tree, layout components, pages (landing, dashboards, test interface, results, leaderboard), hooks for queries and mutations, and admin question creation functionality.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining CSS variables for light and dark themes, including primary colors, backgrounds, borders, and sidebar styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with meta tags, SEO description for Concept Delta MHT-CET platform, and script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring QueryClient, TanStack Router with route tree, ThemeProvider for dark/light modes, and Toaster for notifications.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying Concept Delta branding, quick links (home, dashboard, YouTube), social media handle, copyright notice, and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout wrapper component rendering Navbar, main content outlet, and Footer in a flex column layout.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Navigation bar with Internet Identity authentication, dual admin role verification using useGetCallerUserRole and useIsCallerAdmin hooks, comprehensive diagnostic logging for role state changes, and conditional rendering of Admin/Admin Setup links with automatic reactivity to authentication and role changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages the backend actor instance using React Query, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
Provides a mutation hook for registering admin users with retry logic, extensive logging, and validation of principal format and actor availability before calling the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useChapterWiseTestMut: Exports mutation hooks for creating chapter-wise tests and assigning questions to them, invalidating relevant queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useFullSyllabusTestMu: Provides mutation hooks for creating full syllabus tests and assigning section-specific questions to them, with query invalidation on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context and provider, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides query hooks for fetching questions, tests, user profiles, user roles, and admin status from the backend actor with proper loading states and caching.
Exports a mutation hook for creating questions with pre-flight admin verification, detailed error logging, and automatic query invalidation on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useTestSectionMutatio: Provides placeholder mutation hooks for starting and submitting test sections that currently throw not-implemented errors since backend functionality is pending.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, including color schemes for UI components (sidebar, cards, buttons, charts) and responsive hero image styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication context.
frontend/src/pages/AdminChapterWiseTestC: Admin page for creating chapter-wise tests with question selection, configurable marks per question, duration settings, and role-based access control that redirects non-admin users.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard with tabbed interface showing analytics, test management (full syllabus and chapter-wise), question gallery, and user management with role-based access control.
frontend/src/pages/AdminFullSyllabusTest: Admin page for creating full syllabus tests with two sections (Physics/Chemistry and Maths), allowing question selection for each section with validation and role-based access.
frontend/src/pages/AdminQuestionCreate.t: Admin form for creating multiple-choice questions with support for text/image content, four options, correct answer selection, explanation, subject, and class level classification.
frontend/src/pages/AdminRegistration.tsx: Admin registration page with comprehensive diagnostics for registering Internet Identity principals as administrators, featuring connection phase tracking, timeout detection, retry functionality, and health checks.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page component that displays hero banner, features, YouTube subscription prompt, Telegram channel link, and call-to-action buttons. Redirects authenticated users to dashboard or prompts login for new users.
frontend/src/pages/Leaderboard.tsx: Placeholder leaderboard page that shows a "coming soon" message with construction icon. Redirects unauthenticated users to home and explains future features like top scorers, rankings, and competition tracking.
frontend/src/pages/ResultPage.tsx: Placeholder results page displaying a "coming soon" notice for test result viewing functionality. Redirects unauthenticated users and lists planned features like score viewing, question analysis, and PDF export.
frontend/src/pages/StudentDashboard.tsx: Main student dashboard displaying available full syllabus and chapter-wise mock tests with filtering by class and subject. Shows alert that test-taking functionality is under development and handles test start attempts with placeholder logic.
frontend/src/pages/TestInterface.tsx: Placeholder test-taking interface page showing "coming soon" message. Redirects unauthenticated users and describes future features like timed tests, question answering, progress tracking, and result viewing.
frontend/src/routeTree.tsx: Defines the application's routing structure using TanStack Router, mapping paths to page components including landing, dashboards, admin pages, test interface, results, and leaderboard routes.
frontend/src/utils/pdfExport.ts: Disabled PDF export utility with placeholder types and function signature for generating test result PDFs. Currently shows alert that feature is unavailable until backend test attempt functionality is implemented.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support and methods to clear parameters from URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended theme for sidebar/chart/card components, custom animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state document for 'Concept Delta' MHT-CET mock test platform, tracking architectural decisions, known issues (primarily admin authorization and navbar visibility bugs), and existing features with version 77 state.
